title: Bert Addresses One Of His Top Vacation Complaints
description:
Bert's oldest son, Hayden, isn't a fan of traveling with the family. Because of this, Bert no longer forces him to go on family vacations. He understands that he and his son have different values, but some listeners have been chewing Bert out over this.
So today, he's addressing their comments.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
